resources.string: • Vehicles shown may have optional equipment at additional cost. Covers normal factory scheduled service. Plan is 2 years or 25K miles, whichever comes first. The new Toyota vehicle cannot be part of a rental or commercial fleet, or a livery or taxi vehicle. See plan for complete coverage details. See participating Toyota dealer for details.

• Vehicle names, technical details, equipment specs and colors of the model presented here may vary from country to country. Not all models are available in your country. For more detailed information, access http://www.toyota.com or call (021) 4151212.\n• Other vehicle models are coming soon.
